    Struct ReusableReference<T>

    This class references an effect to play it on runtime efficiently. For advanced usage PushCache(ReusableCache) and ControlledPopCache(ReusableCache) methods should be called before and after creating objects that has .

    CurrentItem

    Returns currently instantiated instance. Return value of this function should not be cached, because playing instance could be finished on further updates.

    Declaration
